steps: Melt half the chocolate in a bowl set over a pan of gently simmering water, then leave to cool slightly.
In a bowl, whip the cream to soft peaks and fold in the melted chocolate to make a marbled effect.
To serve, place the sliced oranges into the base of a glass serving dish, spoon over the chocolate mousse and pour over the rest of the melted chocolate.
title: Chocolate mousse with chocolate orange drizzle
